effect.name: Deesser
effect.description: Apply de-essing to the audio samples.
effect.author: libavfilter

parameter.name: av.i
Intensity
parameter.comment: Set intensity for triggering de-essing. Allowed range is from 0 to 1.

parameter.name: av.m
Max deessing
parameter.comment: Set amount of ducking on treble part of sound. Allowed range is from 0 to 1.

parameter.name: av.f
Frequency
parameter.comment: How much of original frequency content to keep when de-essing. Allowed range is from 0 to 1.
